mapper.select: SELECT board_id AS boardId, board_title AS boardTitle, board_content AS boardContent, board_date AS boardDate, board_update AS boardUpdate, board_hits AS boardHits, board_answer_num AS boardAnswerNum, user_id AS userId, is_notice AS isNotice FROM board WHERE board_id = #{boardId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_title, board_content, board_date, board_hits, user_id) VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, NOW(), 0, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_content = #{boardContent}, board_update = #{boardUpdate}, board_hits = #{boardHits}, board_answer_num = #{boardAnswerNum}, user_id = #{userId}, is_notice = #{isNotice} WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
